mapper.sql: id, project_name, module_id, operate_id, trigger_way_id, user_operation, operate_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into operate_record (project_name, module_id, operate_id, trigger_way_id, user_operation, operate_time, create_time, update_time, content) values (#{projectName}, #{moduleId}, #{operateId}, #{triggerWayId}, #{userOperation}, #{operateTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{content})
mapper.select: select id, module_id from operate_record where module_id = #{moduleId} order by id DESC LIMIT #{topN}, 1
